H0.text: The Orinoco river meets the sea on which country's coast. Colombia

H1.text: The Orinoco river meets the sea on which country's coast. Brazil

H2.text: The Orinoco river meets the sea on which country's coast. Guyana

H3.text: The Orinoco river meets the sea on which country's coast. VEN

A4.text: The Orinoco River empties into the Gulf of Paría and the Atlantic Ocean.

A5.text: Delta Amacuro – 200 km (120 mi) long that empties into the Gulf of Paría and the Atlantic Ocean, a very large delta, some 22,500 km2 (8,700 sq mi) and 370 km (230 mi) at its widest.
